response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking high-quality solutions in their field. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I estimate its worth to be well above $100. Considering its unique qualities and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $150. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity it presents for you to achieve your goals more efficiently. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 150}
